airportBanner.title: Air quality solutions for
airportBanner.description: A complete solution for air quality monitoring, air purification, data accessibility for areas in and around the airports.

airPollutants.title: Major Air
airPollutants.description: The nature of air pollutants inside an airport is so vast that if ignored, they can have extreme effects on passengers, staff, and people living near airports. Due to this, air monitoring becomes essential in and around airports. A real-time air quality monitoring system will enable airport authorities to estimate pollution levels caused by various sources to comply with regulatory standards.

oxides.description: Emission of oxides during the operation

noise.title: Noise
noise.description: Loud noise due to huge no. of people gathering

risk.title: Who are at
risk.description: The occupancy of hotels is one of the major reasons for bad air quality inside hotels. People with underlying health issues, old age groups, children, and sensitive groups are at risk when exposed to air pollution. Even healthy adults can feel sick due to exposure to bad air quality.

healthIssues.title: Underlying Health Issues
healthIssues.description: Passengers and staff with respiratory illnesses already have a weaker respiratory system.
healthIssues.imgAlt: person with respiratory illness in hotel

securityStaff.title: Security Staff
securityStaff.description: The airport security staffs are also threat to the air pollution present inside the premises.

staff.title: Staff
staff.description: The staff may have low of coordination and performance, a high chance of illness.

passenger.title: Passenger
passenger.description: Even healthy passengers may experience uneasiness, headaches, etc.

pm25.title: PM2.5
pm25.description: Cardiorespiratory disorders due to particle exposure

co2.title: CO2
co2.description: People experience breathing issue, nausea, convulsions

noise.title: Noise
noise.description: Stress, anxiety, high BP, headache due to noise

oxides.description: Coughing, choking, fatigue, etc. are experienced if exposed

virusBacteria.title: Virus & Bacteria
virusBacteria.description: Infections are common when exposed to viruses & bacteria

tvoc.title: TVOC
tvoc.description: Headaches, and irritation in the eyes, nose, and throat

description.part1: As the aviation industry is growing rapidly, it becomes essential to monitor and control air pollution in and around airports.
description.part2: air quality monitoring and air purifying solutions give you the power to know what your passengers and staff breathe and analyze the IAQ at airports and in aircraft.

airPollutionEffects.title: The Effects of Air Pollution -
airPollutionEffects.description: When passengers and staff are exposed to poor air quality, they feel nauseous, dizzy, and unwell, and headaches are common symptoms of air pollution exposure.
